metadataAttributes.Title: Palliative Care Always Capstone Course
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: The Palliative Care Always Capstone course is designed to let you test your knowledge about palliative and help others understand the value of palliative care, while showing your creative side. In this course, you will impact community awareness about palliative care, promote self-care and wellness, show-off your communication skills in a virtual environment, and finish the course off by proving your thoughts on ways to offer psychosocial support to a patient and family.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Advance Care Planning,patient-centered care,Palliative Care,Psychosocial Support,
